attributes.action: Make schools in Britain safer to stop knife crime
attributes.additional_details: To protect young children and adults looking after them and to raise more awareness into knife crime across the UK
attributes.background: Make schools a safer place, set boundaries and follow them through in each school to protect students and teachers and to stop any criminal activities going on inside schools.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about students' safety at school, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund all secondary schools to have metal detectors
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714842
